Text: Spring BreakI was talking to Anita this morning and she was asking me if I knew what games we were going to at spring training she heard an ad or something for it and it made it sound fun I think they are trying to decide what to do for Spring Break They me be planning a Florida Trip What should I be telling her So far I have been very vague about it but at some point Im going to have to be more specific I dont want to hurt her feelings but Id rather not spend the whole trip with them Cindy S Dick Design Facility Services Old Katy Road Houston Texas fax email McCOY Providing w o r k p l a c e solutions
